line_1: Would fain behind me leave some token
We home return, a wond'rous token
line_2: Of heaven's kind care, with limbs unbroken.

line_1: Sends each misguided Fool a Token:
line_2: The Pot of Stone, to shivers broken,

line_1: Pledge of your faith, and cherish'd token
line_2: Of vows, through lengthen'd years unbroken;

line_1: Of such a Guest am no bad token;
line_2: So I (with rev'rence be it spoken)

line_1: 'Till you've discharg'd your Wit; — sure token
line_2: He then may wag his tail and open.
Tho' Jews, with reverence be it spoken,

line_1: Of right good will thy simple token.
line_2: With mocks and threats, half lisped, half spoken,
